ccx.app.delayLoading: Your apps are taking longer than usual to load. Relaunch Creative Cloud or restart your computer and try again
ccx.confirmation.uninstall.title: {appName} preferences
ccx.confirmation.uninstall.desc: Before we uninstall this app, please tell us if you’d like to keep or remove notifications, alerts, interface settings, plugins, and other preferences. Removing preferences may prevent them from being migrated to newer versions of the app.
ccx.confirmation.prevVerDisableAU.title: Install version {version} of {appName}
ccx.confirmation.prevVerDisableAU.desc: Installing this version of {appName} will remove the version that is currently installed, along with any updates you may have applied.
ccx.confirmation.prevVerEnableAU.desc: Installing this version of {appName} will remove the version that is currently installed, along with any updates you may have applied. In addition, the auto-update setting for this app will be disabled to prevent overwriting with a new version in future.
ccx.confirmation.disableAUInstall.title: Install version {version} of {appName}
ccx.confirmation.disableAUInstall.desc: Installing this version of {appName} will disable the auto-update setting for this app to prevent overwriting with a new version in the future.
ccx.confirmation.disableAUUninstall.desc: Uninstalling this version of {appName} will disable the auto-update setting for this app to prevent overwriting with a newer version in the future.
ccx.confirmation.elevationPromptInfo.des: Check for an OS prompt and follow the instructions. We will need your system administrator password to continue.
ccx.confirmation.autoUpdate.title: Auto-update
ccx.confirmation.conflict.title: Conflict {actionName} {appName}
ccx.confirmation.conflict.desc: Save your work and close the following programs before continuing.
ccx.confirmation.conflict.deferredUpdate: Save your work, close the following programs, and then select Update now for an immediate update.
Update without closing programs now by selecting Update later. An update will be attempted when applications are closed.
ccx.confirmation.update.title: Update {appName}
ccx.confirmation.update.desc.autoupdate: Let the Creative Cloud app keep all of your apps up to date automatically. If you are working on a project with others using the same app, make sure you’re all using compatible versions.
ccx.confirmation.update.desc.multipleVer: There are multiple updates available for this app. Which version would you like to update?
ccx.confirmation.update.desc: Adjust your selections below if you want to change default options.
ccx.confirmation.switch.keepUpToDate: Always keep apps up to date
There was a problem in {appName} update
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.startTr: There was a problem starting trial for {appName}
ccx.confirmation.emulatedInstall.title: Install Intel-based version of {appName}
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Please try starting the installation over. If that doesn’t fix the problem, contact customer support for help.

{appName} is not yet available for your device.

ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.st: Please try starting the trial over. If that doesn’t fix the problem, contact customer support for help.
ccx.confirmation.emulatedInstall: You are on an {platform} device. While we develop a new version of this app for {platform}, you can use the Intel-based version on your device.
ccx.confirmation.emulatedInstallNoRosett: To run {appName} on your {platform} device, you must first install Rosetta.
ccx.confirmation.macarm.universalInstall: You are on an Apple silicon device. While the Apple silicon version of {appName} will open by default on your machine, you can also access the Intel version of {appName} at any time from the More menu.

ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: We are unable to uninstall {appName} due to insufficient disk space.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: We are unable to update {appName} due to insufficient disk space.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.fix.189: View the error log to find out how much space is required. Then, free up sufficient disk space where the app is installed and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: System requirements not met. See the minimum system requirements for more details.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: System requirements not met. See the minimum system requirements for more details.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: System requirements not met. See the minimum system requirements for more details.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Installation cannot proceed as a newer version of application is already installed. Uninstall the version installed on your system and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Unable to uninstall the product. Click Retry to uninstall it again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Installation cannot proceed as a newer version of application is already installed. Uninstall the version installed on your system and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Installation cannot proceed. Cannot install 64-bit version of the application on a 32-bit machine.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Unable to uninstall the product. Click Retry to uninstall it again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Installation of the update cannot proceed. Cannot install 64-bit version of the application on a 32-bit machine.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Installation cannot proceed as there are multiple logged-in users on this machine. Logoff these users from the machine and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Uninstallation cannot proceed as there are multiple logged-in users on this machine. Logoff these users from the machine and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Installation of the update cannot proceed as there are multiple logged-in users on this machine. Logoff these users from the machine and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: System requirements not met. Please upgrade your system or install on a suitably configured device.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: System requirements not met. Please upgrade your system or install on a suitably configured device.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: System requirements not met. Please upgrade your system or install on a suitably configured device.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: This installer is damaged. First, uninstall this app, then download and install a new version of the Creative Cloud desktop app.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: This installer is damaged. Download and install a new version of the Creative Cloud desktop app.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: This installer is damaged. First, uninstall this app, then download and install a new version of the Creative Cloud desktop app.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Unable to install the product. Click Retry to download and install it again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Errors encountered during uninstallation.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: There was an error installing this update. Please try again later or contact customer support.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Download error. Unable to reach Adobe servers. Check your internet connectivity and firewall settings, and then try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Download error. Unable to reach Adobe servers. Check your internet connectivity and firewall settings, and then try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Download error. Unable to reach Adobe servers. Check your internet connectivity and firewall settings, and then try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Something went wrong and we weren’t able to install {appName}

ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Something went wrong and we weren’t able to update {appName}
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.fix.403: Select Cancel to dismiss this message. Then, go to Updates in Creative Cloud, select "Check for updates" and retry.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Windows updates from Microsoft required to install this product are not available on this computer. Please install the required updates and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Windows updates from Microsoft required to install this product are not available on this computer. Please install the required updates and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: Windows updates from Microsoft required to install this product are not available on this computer. Please install the required updates and try again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: Something went wrong and we weren’t able to install {appName}.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.fix.500: Enable Windows firewall, then click Retry to install the app.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.in: There was an error installing the product. Please try again later or contact customer support.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.un: Unable to uninstall the product. Click Retry to uninstall again.
ccx.confirmation.retryable.error.desc.up: There was an error installing this update. Please try again later or contact customer support.
ccx.confirmation.pii.title: Desktop App Usage
ccx.confirmation.pii.desc: Our desktop apps collect usage data to help Adobe deliver and improve our products and personalize your experience. By installing this app you agree to share this information with Adobe. You can opt-out at any time in
ccx.pdp.platform.agnostic.information.co: Does not work on this device
ccx.pdp.resources.title: {appName} resources
ccx.send-link.title: Send link to mobile device
ccx.send-link.sms.description: An SMS with a download link will be sent to the phone number provided. Our texts are free, but your service provider may charge a usage fee. Adobe does not store or share this mobile number.
ccx.send-link.email.description.multiple: Select the Adobe ID email address where you would like us to send the download link:
ccx.send-link.email.description.single-i: A download link will be sent to your verified Adobe ID email address:
ccx.send-link.link-spam: You have reached the maximum number of attempts for today.
ccx.incompatible.message.heading: Update required
ccx.incompatible.message-prefix: You must update your system to install
ccx.downloadError.title: Something went wrong
ccx.downloadError.description: If reloading your apps doesn’t fix the problem, please contact customer support for help.
ccx.error.description.errorInstalling: Unable to install the product. Click Retry to download and install again.
ccx.panelMasked.title: You don’t have access to manage apps
ccx.panelMasked.description: Permission from your IT administrator may be required to enable apps management.
{appName} is currently installing. If you choose to cancel the installation now, {appName} will not be installed.

ccx.confirmation.appNotEntitled.title: Could not install {appName}
ccx.confirmation.appNotEntitled.desc.1.t: Your account ({email}) does not have access to {appName}. To install the app, continue to start free trial.
ccx.confirmation.appNotEntitled.desc.1.b: Your account ({email}) does not have access to {appName}. To install the app, continue to buy a plan.
ccx.confirmation.appNotEntitled.desc.2: If you have recently purchased a plan with access to {appName}, cancel this dialog, then refresh your account using Help > Check for updates.
ccx.confirmation.appNotEntitled.desc.3: If you want to use a different account, cancel this dialog, then use Help > Sign out, and sign in with desired account.
ccx.confirmation.permissiveInstall.title: Update recommended
{appName} may not work well on your computer. For the best experience, we recommend you update your computer.
ccx.confirmation.enableAutoUpdate.desc: Creative Cloud will keep all of your apps up to date automatically. You can change this setting for individual apps in Preferences
ccx.confirmation.enableAutoUpdate.title: Enable auto-update for all apps
Do you want to enable auto-update for all apps?
ccx.confirmation.autoUpdateOptions.title: Advanced Options
ccx.confirmation.autoUpdateOptions.desc: You can import your previous settings and preferences, and remove older versions. Consider unchecking the option to remove older versions if you are collaborating with others on different versions.
